name: gifti_tool
author: AFNI Developers
description: Tool for creating, displaying, modifying, or comparing GIFTI datasets.

inputs.description: Specify one or more GIFTI datasets as input
inputs.name: Input File

inputs.description: New dataset will have NUMDA DataArray elements
inputs.name: New Number of DataArray Elements

inputs.description: Set data type to TYPE
inputs.name: New Data Type

inputs.description: DA elements will have intent INTENT
inputs.name: New Intent

inputs.description: Set Dimensionality to NUMDIMS
inputs.name: New Dimensionality

inputs.description: Set dims[] to these 6 values
inputs.name: New Dimensions

inputs.description: Write out dataset as gifti image
inputs.name: Output File

inputs.description: Store data in external files
inputs.name: External File List

inputs.description: Add data to empty DataArray elements
inputs.name: Add Data to DataArray

inputs.description: Set verbose level
inputs.name: Verbose Level

inputs.description: Show final gifti image
inputs.name: Show GIFTI Image

inputs.description: Read DataArray list indices
inputs.name: Read DataArray Indices

inputs.description: Set the GIFTI NAME=VALUE attribute pair at GIFTI level
inputs.name: Modify GIFTI Attribute

inputs.description: Add this pair to the GIFTI MetaData
inputs.name: Modify GIFTI MetaData

inputs.description: Set the DataArray NAME=VALUE attribute pair
inputs.name: Modify DataArray Attribute

inputs.description: Set the DataArray NAME=VALUE pair in DA's MetaData
inputs.name: Modify DataArray MetaData

inputs.description: Specify the set of DataArrays to modify
inputs.name: Modify DataArrays

inputs.description: Create a new GIFTI dataset
inputs.name: Create new GIFTI dataset

inputs.description: Compare two GIFTI datasets
inputs.name: Compare GIFTI datasets

inputs.description: Flag to request comparison of the data
inputs.name: Compare data

inputs.description: Set the verbose level of comparisons
inputs.name: Compare Verbose Level

inputs.description: Approximate comparison of GIFTI datasets
inputs.name: Approximate GIFTI comparison
